enum.name: RpIeEnum
enum.description: RTX Proprietary Information Element Type definition

member.name: RP_IE_APP_DATA
member.description: Internal use. Used for Proxy data.

member.name: IeData
member.description: The Info Data (InfoLength number of bytes).

struct.name: RpSIPDisplayNameType
struct.description: Length of SIP display name is given in IeLength

struct.description: Length of SIP number is given in IeLength

struct.name: RpAccountStatusTxtType
struct.description: Length of account s status is given in IeLength

struct.name: RpFeaturePackStatusType
struct.description: Used to inform handset about Broadsoft Feature Package status

struct.description: Use to set system and MMI provider of PP

struct.name: RpFwVersionType
struct.description: Used to inform about Firmware Version

struct.name: RpFwBranchType
struct.description: Used to inform about Firmware Branch Version

typedef.name: RpHwVersionType
typedef.description: Used to inform about Hardware Version

struct.name: RpErrorLogType
struct.description: Used to inform about handset errors

struct.name: RpRssiMeasurementClassicType
struct.description: Used to inform about visible RPNs (Classic mode: 8 bit per RPN)

struct.name: RpRssiMeasurementVlsType
struct.description: Used to inform about visible RPNs (VLS mode: 12 bit per RPN)

union.name: RpRssiMeasurementType
union.description: Used to inform about handset errors

struct.name: RpPpStatusType
struct.description: Used to inform about handset status

struct.name: RpPBXFeatureType
struct.description: Generic PBX feature type.

struct.name: RpRingerControlType
struct.description: Controls the ringer state of the PP

enum.name: RpMultidisplayCodingType
enum.description: Coding types of multidisplay, defining lines and softkeys

struct.name: RpIndicationToneType
struct.description: Used for controlling handset indication tone

struct.name: RpTermBacklitCtrlType
struct.description: Used for controlling backlight

struct.name: RpLampType
struct.description: Used for controlling handset top led

enum.name: RpSipStateType
enum.description: Possible SIP state values for handset

struct.name: RpSipStatusType
struct.description: Used for requesting the state of the handset from the base (either logged in or logged out)

struct.name: RpSrtpStatusType
struct.description: Used for reporting the state of the VOIP Audio connection (RTP/SRTP) from the base

struct.name: RpFpMenusType
struct.description: Inform PP about which FP (remote) menus are available

struct.name: RpLocalEditorStartType
struct.description: Type for starting local (PP) editor from FP

struct.name: RpLocalEditorAnswerType
struct.description: Type for sending local (PP) editor response/answer

struct.name: RpChangeBasicServiceType
struct.description: Type for changing Basic Service for active connection

struct.name: RpNumberInfoType
struct.description: Type for additional number information

member.name: DestAction
member.description: Bit 0-3: Destination Bit 4-6: Action Bit 7: Reserved

typedef.name: BaseIdType
typedef.description: Type for FP Identification: Base number

struct.name: RpFpCompleteIdType
struct.description: Type for a complete FP identification: Base number and IP address

struct.name: RpFpConfigDataType
struct.description: Type for a configuration data from FP.

struct.name: RpRepeaterFeatureType
struct.description: Generic Repeater feature type.

member.name: RpnRssi[12]
member.description: RPN Value and RSSI value of the 12 strongest heard bases/repeaters

member.name: RpnRssiCnt
member.description: Number of Seen RPN?s with RSSI. RpnRssiCnt >= 12 use RpRssiReportType

member.name: RpnRssi[1]
member.description: RPN Value and RSSI value of the RpnRssiCnt strongest heard bases/repeaters

member.name: Rpn
member.description: The RPN value of the base station which should be inquired for free RPNs

member.name: FreeRpn
member.description: Zero if no RPNs are free, non-zero otherwise

struct.name: RpWrsStatsType
struct.description: Contains various statistics from a repeater.

member.name: Version
member.description: Message version. Future versions might add more fields.

member.name: UnlockCnt
member.description: Number of times the repeater has gone out of lock

member.name: RecoveryCnt
member.description: Number of times recovery mode were entered.

member.name: SyncSourceChangeCnt
member.description: Number of times the sync source has changed.

member.name: ConnectionCnt
member.description: Total number of connections, including repeater connections.

member.name: MaxSlotUsageCnt
member.description: Max number of concurrent slots in use. A value of 0 equals idle. For blind slot repeater, a value of 8 equals busy and for zero blind slot a value of 10 equals busy.

member.name: BusySecondsFull
member.description: Number of seconds the repeater has been busy for handset setup in full slot.

member.name: BusySecondsLong
member.description: Number of seconds the repeater has been busy for handset setup in long slot.

member.name: BusyFullCnt
member.description: Number of times the repeater has been busy for handset setup in full slot.

member.name: BusyLongCnt
member.description: Number of times the repeater has been busy for handset setup in long slot.

member.name: PpTrafficTotalFrames
member.description: Total number of traffic frames on PP side of repeater.

member.name: PpRxOkFrames
member.description: Total number of traffic frames on PP side with correct CRC.

member.name: PpTxOkFrames
member.description: Total number of traffic frames on PP side ack?ed by Q2 from FP.

member.name: PpBearerRequestCnt
member.description: Number of bearer requests sent by PP side of repeater.

member.name: PpBearerHoRequestCnt
member.description: Number of bearer handover requests sent by PP side of repeater.

member.name: PpConnectionHoRequestCnt
member.description: Number of connection handover requests sent by PP side of repeater.

member.name: PpBearerEstablishedCnt
member.description: Number of bearers successfully established on PP side of repeater.

member.name: PpBearersDroppedCnt
member.description: Number of dropped bearers on PP side of repeater.

member.name: FpTrafficTotalFrames
member.description: Total number of traffic frames on FP side of repeater.

member.name: FpRxOkFrames
member.description: Total number of traffic frames on FP side with correct CRC.

member.name: FpTxOkFrames
member.description: Total number of traffic frames on FP side ack?ed by Q2 from FP.

member.name: FpBearerRequestCnt
member.description: Number of bearer requests sent by FP side of repeater.

member.name: FpBearerHoRequestCnt
member.description: Number of bearer handover requests sent by FP side of repeater.

member.name: FpConnectionHoRequestCnt
member.description: Number of connection handover requests sent by FP side of repeater.

member.name: FpBearerEstablishedCnt
member.description: Number of bearers successfully established on FP side of repeater.

member.name: FpBearerEstablishedFullCnt
member.description: Number of relayed connections in full slot.

member.name: FpBearerEstablishedLongCnt
member.description: Number of relayed connections in long slot.

member.name: FpBearersDroppedCnt
member.description: Number of dropped bearers on FP side of repeater.

member.name: FpFastReleaseCnt
member.description: Number of fast releases sent by FP side of repeater.

struct.name: RpPhbNumberEntryType
struct.description: Phonebook number entry type

struct.name: RpPhbContactEntryType
struct.description: Phonebook contact entry type

struct.name: RpSysLogFeatureType
struct.description: Generic Repeater feature type.

member.name: Version
member.description: Version of this message. More fields may be added in the future.

member.name: FlushInterval
member.description: Longest interval between flushing the syslog buffer, in minutes. 0 means default.

member.name: FlushLevel
member.description: The fill level in per cent between 0 and 100 before flushing syslog buffer. 0 means default.

enum.name: RpPropReleaseCauseType
enum.description: Release reasons used to display more meaningful info when call is teminated.

enum.name: RpPushToTalkCmdType
enum.description: Commands to signal Push To Talk status.

enum.name: RpPushToTalkGroupCmdType
enum.description: Commands to signal Push To Talk status.

member.name: IsParticipant
member.description: True, if participant in given call

enum.name: RpScaCmdActionType
enum.description: SCA actions to ask base to perform on calls the handset is not participating in.

member.name: LinkDates[1]
member.description: Number of elements in this list is equal to the number of set bits in LinkDatesMask.

struct.name: RpConfStatusType
struct.description: Used for notifying the handset if conference is currently possible

struct.name: RpPttConferenceType
struct.description: PTT Conference specific communication.

struct.name: RpPttConfInitType
struct.description: Used for initial setup of PttConferenceApp

member.name: TalkModeTimeout
member.description: Delay before TALK connection will be released (in seconds)

member.name: NumberOfConferences
member.description: The total number of conferences in the system

member.name: DefaultId
member.description: Id of the default selected conference

struct.name: RpPttConfReqType
struct.description: Used for simple requests that only require the id of the conference.

struct.name: RpPttConfCfmType
struct.description: Used for simple confirm messages.

member.name: Status
member.description: Did the request succeed or not

member.name: TalkModeTimeout
member.description: Delay before TALK connection will be released (in seconds). (For resulting conference)

member.name: PttLatchTimeout
member.description: Timeout for PTT latch (in seconds). (For resulting conference)

struct.name: RpPttConfListItemReqType
struct.description: Used for requesting a conference list item.

struct.name: RpPttConfListItemCfmType
struct.description: Used for returning a conference list item.

member.name: Status
member.description: Did the request succeed or not

struct.name: RpPttConfCallbackStatusType
struct.description: PTT Conference callback status information

member.name: Id
member.description: Internal id of callback in conference (stored on base)
